_source.text: After co-producing the SCARDIFF Horror Convention last year and the aniManga POP! show in Plymouth last month, time to add yet another COMIC EXPO style Convention and where better than Bristol to do so....

text: last month, time to add yet another COMIC **EXPO** **style** Convention and where **better** **than** Bristol to do so....
